name: Sweet Days Christmas Gift Set
description:
Make Christmas easy this year with a gorgeous Saponify Gift Set!

This gift set contains:

1 x limited edition Sugar and Spice Hand and Body Butter
1 x limited edition Sugar and Spice Body Scrub
1 x Calendula Goats Milk Soap 
1 x Cinnamon, Oatmeal and Honey Soap

All purchases are beautifully, and carefully gift wrapped for safe delivery. This Christmas all Gift Sets will be delivered free of charge anywhere in Australia - that's a saving of $13 off your order!

All of our products are handmade in small batches right here in Sydney, with the very best ingredients.

Designed especially with sensitive-skinned people in mind, all of our products are super gentle and nourishing, palm oil free, and scented with pure essential oils.

name: Sugar and Spice Body Butter with Cinnamon, Orange and Vanilla
description:
This limited edition Body Butter is sure to please this Christmas. Scented with a delicious combination of Cinnamon, Sweet Orange, and Ginger Essential Oils, along with natural Vanilla Oleoresin, it really something special. Yum!

Packed with skin-loving Sweet Almond Oil and Organic Shea and Cocoa Butters, this luscious body butter will hydrate your skin and leave it feeling soft, silky and nourished.

Ingredients: 
Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifying Wax, Beeswax, Stearic Acid, Optiphen Plus, Essential Oils of Cinnamon and Sweet Orange, Vanilla Oleoresin, Ginger Essential Oil.

I use a very small amount of Optiphen Plus in my body butter recipes. It protects against bacterial and mould growth, is skin safe, and is paraben and formeldehyde-free!

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Hand and Body Butter.

name: Sugar and Spice Body Scrub with Cinnamon, Ginger and Vanilla
description:
This limited edition Shea Butter Body Scrub is sure to please this Christmas.  Scented with a delicious combination of Cinnamon, Sweet Orange, and Ginger Essential Oils, along with natural Vanilla Oleoresin, it really something special.  Yum!

Ingredients:
Organic Raw Sugar, Organic Shea Butter, Fractionated Coconut Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Optiphen Plus, Ground Cloves, Essential Oils of Cinnamon, Sweet Orange and Ginger, Vanilla Oleoresin.

I use a very small amount of Optiphen Plus in my sugar scrub recipe.  It protects against bacterial and mould growth, is skin safe, and is paraben and formeldehyde-free!

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Shea Butter Sugar Scrub.

To use:
Best applied to damp skin.  Start applying the product at your feet, work your way up your legs with small circular movements working towards the heart, then start at the hand and work up the arms.  Followed by the abdomen, waist, hips and back.  Once you've applied it to the entire body, go back over and massage 2-3 more times.  Rinse off with warm water, and pat yourself dry with a soft towel.  It will leave a light oily layer on your skin that feels heavenly.  Your skin will feel so soft and nourished that you wont need to use a moisturiser.  
NB: This product may leave a slightly oily residue on the surface of your shower or bathtub, so take care not to slip!

name: Lemongrass and Spearmint Sea Salt Handmade Soap
description:
Salt in soap?  Really?  Why, yes!

With the refreshing and invigorating combination of Lemongrass and Spearmint Essential Oils, and mineral-rich pure Australian Sea Salt, these Sea Salt Spa Bars are a great 'pick-me-up' for your morning shower.  You really do feel invigorated after showering with one of these babies!

From looking at them you'd be forgiven for thinking that they seem like they'd be rough on your skin, but rest assured that they actually feel very smooth to wash with.  Made with 40% Sea Salt these soaps are super hard and really long-lasting.

This soap contains a high percentage of Coconut Oil, which is used to create a soft and fluffy later. Grapeseed Oil has been added for it's excellent skin-nourishing properties. This soap also contains Castor Oil, which is a wonderful emollient and will help to ensure your skin retains it's natural moisture after washing.

This listing is for one bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between soaps - that's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients: 
Sea Salt, Coconut Oil, Fresh Goats Milk, Lye, Grapeseed Oil, Castor Oil, Essential Oils of Lemongrass and Spearmint.

name: Lavender Goats Milk Handmade Soap
description:
This nourishing, gentle soap is perfect for even the most sensitive skin. 

The combination of goats milk and lavender is very soothing to the skin, which makes this soap great for anyone suffering from Eczema, Dermatitis or chapped, dry skin.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Organic Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients: 
Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Fresh Australian Goats Milk, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Lavender Essential Oil.

name: Neem, Hemp and Honey Shampoo Bar
description:
Have you ever washed your hair with soap?  I'd recommend this soap for anyone wanting to try a natural, soothing remedy for their psoriasis and dandruff.

This Shampoo Bar lathers up beautifully - just swipe it directly onto your hair, or lather a good amount into your hands and massage into your hair, paying special attention to your scalp.  Rinse well with lukewarm water, and then follow with a 50/50 apple cider vinegar and water rinse (this helps to balance the ph of your scalp), or my soon-to-be-released Hair Tonic.

Some people can find Neem Tree Oil and Apple Cider Vinegar to be strong-smelling, so I've added a generous amount of Rosemary, Tea Tree and Peppermint Essential Oils for an uplifting, fresh scent, that also benefits the hair.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap

Ingredients:
Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Olive OIl, Neem Tree Oil, Lye, Hemp Seed Oil, Castor Oil, Manuka Honey, Essential Oils of Rosemary, Tea Tree and Peppermint.

name: Gritty Kitchen Soap with Orange Peel and Walnut Shell
description: This soap is loaded with natural exfoliants to scrub and clean hard working hands. Orange Peel Powder provides scrub and a lovely warm orange scent, while Ground Coffee and Walnut Shells really get to work removing any kitchen grubbiness. Coffee grounds absorb kitchen smells (hello garlic hands!), while antibacterial Tea Tree and Lavender Essential Oils leave your hands smelling fresh and clean. I love this as a kitchen soap, but it also works wonderfully to get soil off your hands after gardening too! This soap was made using the rebatch method. You can read all about the soaping process in this blog post. All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy! This listing is for 1 x 120g hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade. Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Lye, Cocoa Butter, Organic Shea Butter, Castor Oil, Soap Pieces, Orange Peel Powder, Walnut Shells, Coffee Grounds, Pumice, Essential Oils of Lavender, Tea Tree, Rosemary and Spearmint.

name: Charcoal Confetti Handmade Soap with Spearmint, Lavender & Pine
description:
These gorgeous soaps are lightly scented with Spearmint, Lavender and Pine Essential Oils, and get their black colouring from gently exfoliating Activated Charcoal powder.  The pretty coloured pieces throughout are tiny pieces of each of my other batches of soap.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 120g bar of soap.


Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Lye, Cocoa Butter, Organic Shea Butter, Castor Oil, Soap Pieces, Activated Charcoal, Essential oils of Spearmint, Lavender & Pine Scotch.

name: Rosemary and Mandarin Hand and Body Butter
description:
Packed with skin-loving Sweet Almond Oil and Organic Shea and Cocoa Butters, this luscious body butter will hydrate your skin and leave it feeling soft, silky and nourished.

The Essential Oils used in this blend combine to create an uplifting, fresh, herbaceous scent.

Ingredients:
Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifying Wax, Beeswax, Kaolin Clay, Stearic Acid, Optiphen Plus, Rosemary Essential Oil and Mandarin Essential Oil.

I use a very small amount of Optiphen Plus in my body butter recipes.  It protects against bacterial and mould growth, is skin safe, and is paraben and formeldehyde-free!

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Hand and Body Butter.

name: Calendula Goats Milk Handmade Soap
description:
This nourishing, gentle soap is perfect for even the most sensitive skin.

Great as a facial soap, for delicate baby skin, or as an all over body soap.  Perfect for anyone suffering from Eczema, Dermatitis or chapped, dry skin.

I took Extra Virgin Olive Oil and slowly infused it with Organic Calendula Petals, and it resulted in a golden-hued, delicately scented oil that is extremely soothing.  Calendula has excellent anti-inflammatory properties, thus making it perfect for those with dry skin conditions.  The Calendula infused olive oil was added to fresh Australian Goats Milk to make this wonderfully rich, extremely gentle soap.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Organic Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of our soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Organic Calendula infused Australian Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Fresh Australian Goats Milk, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Calendula Petals.

name: Grapefruit, Rosewood and Carrot Seed Nourishing Face Cream
description:
You need only use a small amount of this rich and nourishing Face Cream to feel the benefits. Made with a specially selected combination of skin loving plant oils and butters, this non-greasy formula will leave your skin feeling soft, silky and moisturised.

Several of my customers swear by this product and use nothing else on their face - a fact that I'm extremely proud of!

Grapefruit, Rosewood and Geranium Essential Oils are all effective in helping to treat acne and oily skin, while Carrot Seed Essential Oil revitalises the appearance of the skin and improves the complexion. Lavender Essential Oil reduces inflammation and helps to heal damaged skin tissue.

Ingredients: 
Distilled Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Shea Nut Butter, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifying Wax, Beeswax, Stearic Acid, Optiphen Plus, Grapefruit Essential Oil, Rosewood Essential Oil, Geranium Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil and Carrot Seed Essential Oil.

I use a very small amount of Optiphen Plus in my face cream recipe.  It protects against bacterial and mould growth, is skin safe, and is paraben and formeldehyde-free!

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Essential Face Cream.

What my customers have to say:

"Your face cream is amazing, my skin has never felt better after i have moisturised."

"I use it day and night and it is perfect for both"

name: Peppermint, Rosemary and Lavender Handmade Soap
description:
I just love this soap - it's fresh and invigorating, and smells incredible!

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Peppermint Essential Oil, Rosemary Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil, Barley Grass Powder.

name: Cinnamon, Oatmeal and Honey Handmade Soap
description:
I've combined sweet, skin-softening New Zealand Manuka Honey with gently exfoliating ground oatmeal and warming Cinnamon Leaf Essential Oil to create a delicious smelling bar of soap that's a hands-down favourite with my customers.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Cinnamon Leaf Essential Oil, Manuka Honey, Oatmeal, Ground Cinnamon.

What my customers have to say:

"The Cinnamon soap is amazing...I feel like a warm toasty cinnamon bun every time i get out of the shower...!"

name: Carrot Seed and Rosewood Gentle Jojoba Face Scrub
description:
Is your skin feeling dull or dry? Maybe you've been having a bit too much fun in the sun this summer and you've been neglecting your lovely face. Fear not - this exfoliating facial scrub would love to help out!

This sublime formulation contains tiny Jojoba Beads which gently roll across your face removing dead skin cells and smoothing the complexion. We've also included deep cleansing Kaolin Clay, which absorbs dirt and grime while gently exfoliating. Rich in essential fatty acids and Vitamins A and E, Sweet Almond Oil deeply penetrates the skin, leaving it soft and moisturised. Our special combination of Carrot Seed, Rosewood and Geranium Essential Oils have all been chosen for their cleansing, soothing and balancing properties.

Suitable for all skin types. Use as often as you wish depending on you own skin's needs.

Ingredients: 
Demineralised Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Jojoba Wax Beads, Kaolin Clay, Vitamin E, Phenoxyethanol, Essential Ois of Carrot Seed, Rosewood and Geranium, Potassium Sorbate.

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Gentle Face Scrub

name: May Chang and Activated Charcoal Handmade Soap
description:
These elegant soaps are the newest addition to the Saponify range, and they smell even better than they look!

I've used a single Essential Oil to scent these soaps - May Chang,  commonly referred to by its botanical name - Litsea Cubeba.  The aroma is often compared to Lemongrass, but I find its fragrance sweeter, softer, and more of a true lemon-scent.  Something that is hard to achieve with other citrus essential oils in soap making as they're so volatile.

Activated Charcoal is what gives these soaps their great colour, and also provides a very gentle exfoliating, and deep cleansing effect on the skin.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients: 
Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, May Chang (Litsea Cubeba) Essential Oil, Activated Charcoal Powder.

name: Manuka Honey Handmade Soap
description:
Everyone just loves the delicate honey scent of these pretty soaps!  Packed to the brim with skin loving oils and plant butters these honey soaps are absolute luxury in a bar.  These soaps have a rich soft lather - perfect for use as a delicate facial soap.

Honey Soap is perfect if you have sensitivities to Essential Oils or Fragrance Oils as the only fragrance in this soap is naturally occurring - from the added Beeswax, and loads of Manuka Honey.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Apricot Kernel Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Organic Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Manuka Honey, Beeswax.

name: Activated Charcoal Handmade Facial Soap
description:
I'm very proud of the newest addition to the Saponify range!  An earthy blend of skin-beneficial Carrot Seed, Geranium and Lavender Essential Oils, plus deep-cleansing Activated Charcoal Powder make for a wonderfully gentle, yet deep-cleansing bar of soap.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Apricot Kernel Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Organic Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Lye, Cocoa Butter, Organic Shea Butter,  Apricot Kernel Oil, Rosehip Oil, Jojoba Oil, Activated Charcoal Powder, Lavender Essential Oil, Geranium Essential Oil, Carrot Seed Essential Oil.

name: Peppermint and Lemongrass Hand and Body Butter
description:
Packed with skin-loving Sweet Almond Oil and Organic Shea and Cocoa Butters, this luscious body butter will hydrate your skin and leave it feeling soft, silky and nourished.

The Essential Oils used in this blend have been chosen for their refreshing and uplifting properties. An aroma of herbaceous Lemongrass, lively and fresh Peppermint, floral and comforting Lavender, and just a hint of herbal earthiness from the dash of Rosemary.

Ingredients:
Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifying Wax, Beeswax, Stearic Acid, Otiphen Plus, Essential Oils of Lavender, Peppermint, Lemongrass and Rosemary.

I use a very small amount of Optiphen Plus in my body butter recipes.  It protects against bacterial and mould growth, is skin safe, and is paraben and formeldehyde-free!

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Hand and Body Butter.

name: Rose Geranium, Lavender and May Chang Handmade Soap
description:
This pretty soap has an amazing fragrance - think flower beds and lemon trees!  I wanted to create something quite special, and scented these soaps with Rose Geranium, Lavender, May Chang and Rosemary Essential Oils.

I've added Kaolian and Illite French Clays to this soap both for colour, and for their ability to purify, detoxify and cleanse the skin.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade!

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Kaolin and Illite French Clays, Essential Oils of Rose Geranium, Lavender, May Chang and Rosemary, Rose Buds, Lavender Petals.

name: Gardener's Gritty Herbal Hand Soap
description:
Spring is here, and so is the gardening season!  Designed with green-thumbed people in mind, this super-scrubby soap will leave your hard-working hands clean, dirt-free, and smelling like you've been rummaging around in a herb garden.

The perfect gift for the gardener in your life!

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Ground Pumice, Ground Coffee, Ground Tea Tree Leaves, Essential Oils of Rosemary, Eucalyptus, Sage and Lavender.

name: Rose Geranium, Mandarin and Patchouli Hand and Body Butter
description:
Packed with skin-loving Sweet Almond Oil and Organic Shea and Cocoa Butters, this luscious body butter will hydrate your skin and leave it feeling soft, silky and nourished.

The Essential Oils used in this blend have been chosen for their relaxing and calming properties. An aroma of sweet Rose Geranium, fresh Mandarin, and just a hint of earthiness from the dash of Patchouli.

Ingredients:
Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifying Wax, Beeswax, Kaolin and Illite Clays, Stearic Acid, Optiphen Plus, Essential Oils of Rose Geranium, Mandarin, Patchouli and Geranium.

I use a very small amount of Optiphen Plus in my body butter recipes.  It protects against bacterial and mould growth, is skin safe, and is paraben and formeldehyde-free!

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Hand and Body Butter.

name: Bergamot, Patchouli and Lemongrass Handmade Soap
description:
Made with Spring in mind, these soaps are fragranced with pure Essential Oils, and have an earthy, citrus scent.  I just love it!
They also have a pleasant exfoliating effect due to the inclusion of ground Fair Trade Coffee, and Organic Chamomile Flowers.

My soap is made the old fashioned way with lots of skin loving Olive Oil, Organic Shea Butter and Castor Oil - all of which are known for their superior moisturising and nourishing properties. Coconut Oil, combined with Cocoa Butter makes for a hard long-lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather.

All of my soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Unlike commercial soap, Cold Process Soap retains it's naturally occurring glycerin content. This is why Cold Process Soap never dries out your skin or leaves it feeling dry and itchy!

This listing is for one hand cut bar of handmade soap. Slight variations in appearance will occur between batches, and even slices. That's the beauty of handmade.

This listing is for 1 x 100g bar of soap.

Ingredients:
Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Lye, Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Bergamot Essential Oil, Patchouli Essentail Oil, Lemongrass Essential Oil, Ground Coffee, Organic Chamomile Flowers.

name: Geranium, Lavender and Mandarin Shea Butter Body Scrub
description:
"Oh my god... just tried your sugar scrub for the first time & yum!! Best shower product in forever. Skin feels pretty amazingly soft & moisturised now."

"I used your sugar scrub today and I really like it.  My skin felt so smooth after getting out of the shower, but not overly oily. Smelled great too!  Well done on a great product!"

The emails I've had from happy customers speak for themselves!

Massage this soft, creamy-textured scrub over your body to smooth rough skin and enliven the senses.  The scent is uplifting and feminine - a combination of subtly sweet, rosy geranium, unashamedly floral lavender, and bright, fresh mandarin.  


Ingredients:
Organic Raw Sugar, Organic Shea Nut Butter, Fractionated Coconut Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Ground Pumice, Optiphen Plus, Essential Oils of Geranium, Lavender and Mandarin, Vitamin E.

I use a very small amount of Optiphen Plus in my sugar scrub recipe.  It protects against bacterial and mould growth, is skin safe, and is paraben and formeldehyde-free!

This listing is for 1 x 100ml tub of Shea Butter Sugar Scrub.

To use:
Best applied to damp skin.  Start applying the product at your feet, work your way up your legs with small circular movements working towards the heart, then start at the hand and work up the arms.  Followed by the abdomen, waist, hips and back.  Once you've applied it to the entire body, go back over and massage 2-3 more times.  Rinse off with warm water, and pat yourself dry with a soft towel.  It will leave a light oily layer on your skin that feels heavenly.  Your skin will feel so soft and nourished that you wont need to use a moisturiser.  
NB: This product may leave a slightly oily residue on the surface of your shower or bathtub, so take care not to slip!

name: Lavender, Geranium, Ylang Ylang and Rosewood Luxury Bath Soaking Salts
description:
These bath salts were extremely popular at the most recent market stall we did.  People LOVED the way that they smelled.

Bath Salts are a simple and luxurious way to add valuable trace minerals to the bathwater.  This specially formulated blend  is smoothing and softening to the skin, and calming and relaxing to the mind.

The essential oils used combine to make a sweetly floral scent, with woodsy undertones.  The Ylang Ylang really shines through - its exotic scent is a known aphrodisiac too!

We've double bagged the salts for you to keep them safe on their journey.  Inside you'll find a cellophane bag that has been heat sealed to keep the salts dry and the wonderful aroma in.  Feel free to empty the smaller bag into the outer bag once opened, or pop them into a clean glass jar if you're planning on keeping them anywhere damp.

Ingredients:
Epsom Salts, Sea Salts, Kaolin Clay, Natrasorb (Tapioca Starch), Lavender Essential Oil, Geranium Essential Oil, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil, Rosewood Essential Oil.

This listing is for 1 x 500g bag of bath soaking salts; enough for at least 6 baths.


This product was reviewed by Aussie Product Review in August 2010.  Here is what they had to say:

"Saponifys bath salts were just as impressive. The salt softened the bath water and the essential oils scent filled the room to create a relaxing atmosphere and even more luxurious was the slight shimmer of the water due to the pearlescent glitter, just beautiful. I felt like I was unwinding at a day spa! The bag of bath salts contains enough for five baths, so I have another four relaxing evenings to come."

name: Slatted Soap Dish
description:
Extend the life of your Saponify Soaps by ensuring they are kept in a well drying soap dish between uses.

These soap dishes have a slatted base to allow the soap to properly dry and for excess water to drain away.

These soap dishes really do work!

Made from Australian Plantation farmed Birch Wood.

Each Soap Dish measures approx:
Length - 11.2cm
Width 6cm
Height 2cm

This listing is for 1 x Birch Wood Soap Dish.  Soap not included in the purchase price.

name: Natural exfoliating Loofah Sponge
description:
Using a Loofah in the shower is a completely natural way to incorporate body exfoliation into your beauty regime.  Loofah Sponges are the dried fruit of a subtropical plant, Luffa aegyptiaca.  They're completely natural, biodegradable and compostable.

Use in the shower or bath with some hand made soap for a great exfoliating wash.  Wet your Loofah thoroughly to make it soft and pilable, and then work it over your body in gentle, circular motions.  Exfoliating regularly will remove dead surface skin and promote the regeneration of new skin cells.

Your Loofah comes with a handy looped cord attached so that you can easily hang them up to dry after each use.  Keeping it dry between uses prevents bacteria growth, and keeps it healthy for you to use.

These Loofah measure approximately 17cm in length.

I would recommend that if you're using your Loofah wet in the shower that you replace it after 3 months of use.  As it is biodegradable be sure to throw it into the compost when you're done!

**  The skin on your face is quite delicate, therefore I recommend you use the Loofah for body exfoliation only.  **

name: Loofah Slices
description:
Our environmentally friendly, non-toxic loofah are great for a myriad of uses in the home.  Pair them with one of our handmade soaps for a lovely, thoughtful gift, or do as we do and use them as quick drying soap dishes!  

Use your loofah in one of the following ways to get the most out of it:
- As an environmentally friendly dish scrubber (pop it in the dishwasher for a clean every once in a while) 
- As a soap dish (this really works! we do this ourselves here at Saponify HQ) 
- As a vegetable scrubber (great for potatoes and other root vegetables)

Slices range from 5 - 7cm in diameter.

Check out our blog post here for more information about these wonderful little sponges.  http://blog.saponify.com.au/2012/02/loofah-ultimate-soap-dish.html

name: Activated Charcoal and Goats Milk Complexion Soap - discontinued
description: We're sorry but this product is no longer available. Please check out our new and improved Activated Charcoal Facial Soap, or Calendula Goats Milk Soap. These soaps contains Activated Charcoal for it's deep cleansing abilities, and a carefully selected combination of Essential Oils known for their balancing effect on the skin - perfect for clear, blemish-free skin. Activated Charcoal deep cleanses the skin by drawing out impurities. It very gently exfoliates as you wash, leaving your skin clean and smooth. Goats Milk is known for being very gentle on the skin, which is why it's so great for anyone with sensitive skin. Organic Shea Nut Butter, Apricot Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, and Olive Oil have been included in this recipe for their remarkable nourishing and moisturising qualities. These soaps also contain Castor Oil, which is a wonderful emollient and will help to ensure your skin retains it's natural moisture after washing. Cocoa Butter, along with Coconut Oil combine to provide a hard, long lasting bar with a soft, fluffy lather. These soaps have a light grey lather, which washes off the skin beautifully with water leaving your skin fresh and cleansed. All of our soaps are handmade from scratch using the Cold Process method. Handmade soap retains its naturally high glycerin content, which results in a lovely moisturising bar. As these soaps are hand poured there will be a slight variation in weight from soap to soap. We will not send anything to you that weighs under 80g. Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Goats Milk, Lye, Organic Shea Nut Butter, Cocoa Butter, Rice Bran Oil, Castor Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Rosemary Essential Oil, Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Tea Tree Essential Oil, Activated Charcoal Powder, Titanium Dioxide.
